caller_intent: Meg is seeking assistance to create a certificate of insurance that previews coverage details for a client (Gola company) before the policy is issued, specifically focusing on general liability and umbrella coverage.
resolution_steps: Jessica confirms the need for a certificate without a policy number to showcase coverage details.
Explains how to highlight coverage on the quote and map it to the certificate (e.g., project-based general liability limits).
Addresses the need to check if the current umbrella policy can be retained with the new general liability policy.
Agrees to prepare the certificate and send it by the same day.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy structure (general liability, umbrella coverage)
Policy number requirements for issued policies
Carrier-specific coverage terms (e.g., project-based vs. aggregate limits)
systems_referenced: Internal quote and certificate generation tools
summary: Meg requested help creating a certificate of insurance for Gola company to preview coverage details before policy issuance. Jessica explained how to map quote details to the certificate, highlighted project-based general liability limits, and discussed retaining the existing umbrella policy. Jessica committed to preparing the certificate for same-day delivery.
